name: Smartwool PhD Outdoor Light Pattern Mini Socks - Women's
categories: PhD Outdoor Light Pattern Mini Socks
description: Minimalist socks that stay in place when you're hiking trails or sprinting up stairs.Made of soft merino wool, nylon and elastane.4-degree elite fit system uses 2 types of elastic for stretch, recovery and to keep the sock in place.Indestructawool Technology in high-impact areas for comfort.Mesh ventilation zones provide moisture management.Toe is almost seamless.Narrower profile is designed to fit women's narrower feet.
